tool_description: Empower your applications with the YTS Movie Search and Listing API. This API allows you to seamlessly search for movies, filter results by quality, genre, ratings, and more, and present them in a user-friendly format. Retrieve essential movie data, including IMDb and Rotten Tomatoes ratings. With easy pagination and sorting options, you can provide your users with an exceptional movie search experience. Explore the world of movies with our YTS Movie Search and Listing API.
name: Movie Search and Listing API
title: Movie Search and Listing API

api_list.name: Parameter Endpoints
api_list.description: Used to list and search through out all the available movies. Can sort, filter, search and order the results
